TaskDescription: participants had to sit still in the laboratory. sequences of 3 minutes were recorded with eyes open closed and eyes closed open, respectively. Both recordings were performed either before (acq-pre) or and after (acq-post) a battery of neurocognitive experiments (duration about 2 hours). Session 1 (first measurement) and session 2 (first follow-up) were performed with a time lag of about 5 years
InstitutionName: Leibniz Research Centre for Working Environment and Human Factors
